lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can, and I want to help encourage self-reliance and independence. .

lender.name: Partiban
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who really need some form of assistance to breakaway from hunger and poverty. Kiva's objective and vision is something inline with my vision and therefore I'm very much comfortable to lend my help within my capacity.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working in an IT company in Malaysia as a system engineer. Most of the time i got to work with computers. I enjoy my job!

lender.name: Anno Wietze
lender.loan_because: Ik een bijdrage wil leveren aan een betere wereld.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: It´s just a wonderful idea - and it works.

lender.name: Theres Suzanne
lender.loan_because: All people in the world should have a chance to do something for a better life!!!

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help children to grow up healthy and confident.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: microcredit is a proven method of helping hard working people improve the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I advise my clients on how best to invest their money.

lender.name: Klaas Frens
lender.loan_because: In my point of view it's a world citizen's duty to help the other one. DIFFERENT COLOURS, ONE PEOPLE !

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: it's sheer luck that I'm in a position to be able to lend. It's only fair to pay that luck forward.
lender.occupational_info: You know how the internet is made up of millions of computers connected together? I look after the bits that connect them.

lender.name: andi
lender.loan_because: dengan uang tersebut kami ingin membeli sebuah mesin las
lender.occupational_info: pekerjaan kami setiap hari adalah membuat atau memperbaiki pagar teralis atau pintu keamanan rumah, selama ini kami menyewa mesin las, kami berharap mempunyai mesin las yang baru

lender.name: Briana
lender.loan_because: I want to help as many people as possible, even if they live thousands of miles away.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school. :) Actually, I take half my classes at school, and half at home.

lender.name: Mastermind Success
lender.loan_because: As a group, we understand that the best way to improve and enhance our own lives is to work to improve and enhance the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: A meeting of the minds; to share thoughts, ideas, opinions and information.

lender.name: Emil
lender.loan_because: everyone that needs some help, should get some help
lender.occupational_info: I help make the internet better to use!

lender.name: UU PEACE Fellowship
lender.occupational_info:
Unitarian Universalist is a liberal religion that respects the worth and dignity of all humans. We are on this earth to make it a better place for all.
Our congregation name, PEACE, is an acronym standing for Peace, Education, Action, Community and Environment.

lender.name: Clarissa & Andrea
lender.loan_because: we want to foster entrepreneurship everywhere

lender.name: Ayhan
lender.loan_because: I believe in this micro finance sytem does work and change the lives of the people

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: To be a leader of others, one must lead by example.

lender.name: themightymouse
lender.loan_because: It is important to help people to pursue their goals.

lender.name: manuel
lender.loan_because: I would like to microcredit dream realised. I 've got another similar idea for young couples looking for purchasing the first house like myself. I would be gread if we could avoid banks and get the money from private people in order to pay a lower interest rate.

lender.name: ERNESTO
lender.whereabouts: MONTE CARLO PRINCIPATO DI MONACO MC

lender.name: Matteo
lender.loan_because: i'm happy about my life and I would like to help someone to be happy like me!

lender.name: Fabio
lender.loan_because: I wish share a bit of what I have with people that is less lucky than me.
lender.occupational_info: I sell difficult and technical products in different Countries. I travel a lot and I know a lot of new places and people. This makes my life very lucky.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that people all over the world can come together to help complete strangers get ahead in life.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I am interested in people who want to work to improve themselves and to provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in a university in California. I was a librarian. Now I am helping my family and assisting in caring for my very elderly mother, and my husband.

lender.name: Everly
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large university medical library. I manage the circulation department (where you check out books).

lender.name: Marco
lender.occupation: Textile Engineer - Hopefully Musician very soon
lender.loan_because: We should believe in dream..... we should fight for dream.... and we should help people as much as we can to work for their dream.....

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I feel that if everyone in first world countries were to take part in a program like this, a real difference could be made in the fight against poverty. Rather than wishing that everyone would do it, I'll take the first steps, loan some of my money, and let as many people know about this as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am an aerospace engineering student studying to design airplanes.

lender.name: Federico
lender.loan_because: Faccio la mia parte...

lender.name: Meghna - Sanjeev
lender.loan_because: with a relatively small amount of money, someone's life can forever be positively changed!

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: Everyone in the world deserves access to finance. All of us want the opportunity to work hard to help our families, help our communities, and help the world. Access to loans helps increase our power to achieve success.
lender.occupational_info: I study the impact of microfinance programs on the well-being of rural households and villages in less-developed countries. My goals is to understand how we can make sure all people around the world have secure access to food and nutrition, and to financial tools which can help improve the welfare of their families and the well-being of their communities.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: We all need help and cannot do it alone.
lender.occupational_info: I try and make sure businesses do not destroy the environment to make money

lender.name: Filippo e Valentina
lender.occupational_info: Ciao ciao

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: simply put; I want to.
lender.occupational_info: I run a web design, development and hosting company.

lender.name: veronica
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance in life

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: it's important to give back something. There are many people less lucky than us in the world and it's only righteous to provide them with the financial means to change and improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a pa for a protestant church in Italy

lender.name: Rick
lender.occupational_info: I assist "non-traditional" college bound students successfully transition into the online degree program of their choice.

lender.name: Fernando
lender.loan_because: In the EU and in the US we enjoy a high standard of life because we had exploited other nations' resources so badly through our multinationals. This is the minimum we can do to pay for the ride.

lender.name: Tomas
lender.loan_because: because I believe it helps
lender.occupational_info: I produce feature films

lender.name: Giancarlo
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a break
lender.occupational_info: I help people discover their own strength and openness.

lender.name: Ernesto
lender.loan_because: it seems an interesting initiative
lender.occupational_info: M.D. in addiction medicine

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: when all have the opportunity to build a better life, peace will be easier to obtain and sustain
lender.occupational_info: I am a credit union manager. This financial cooperative exists to better the financial lives of its member owners.

lender.name: leonardo
lender.whereabouts: port of spain trinidad and tobago

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Writer & civil rights activist, David Badash covers politics in general & gay rights in particular. He created The New Civil Rights Movement, and The Great Nationwide Kiss-In. David lives in a tiny Hell's Kitchen studio with his big Black Lab, Text.

lender.occupational_info: I play Water Polo for the Canadian National Team.

lender.name: Victor & Elvira
lender.loan_because: we can!

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I have the means to help others improve their financial stability or independence. I have been very fortunate and I'd like to pay it forward, so to speak.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: Graduating college in December 2008 and then off to law school

lender.name: Tory

lender.name: Carmella

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because:
I think it's a great idea.
I don't see why people in developing countries shouldn't have access to loans and just cos your in a rich country it should be easier.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working in Lyon, France running a small business English and language teaching.

lender.name: Pascal
lender.loan_because: i want give a little bit of the small what i have. i feed three children, so i want to help some other mothers.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping people from my hemisphere. Somebody that lives fairly close to Texas. ( Mexico and Central America )
lender.occupational_info:
I work in gaming software, but also do photography, animation and make documentaries.
As well I am a musician and enjoy playing and writing tunes.

lender.name: Lu C
lender.loan_because: I hope to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children with special needs.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Jesus tells us to help those who are in need, and I think this is a great way to give in a smart way. Plus, I can re-use the money when it gets paid back to help even more people.
lender.occupational_info: I study to become a pastor in the Lutheran church (a denomination of Christianity)

lender.name: Ellen and Matt
lender.loan_because: We believe in hope, love and friendship
lender.occupational_info: Financial Planner

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: i help small companies in the US raise the money they need to go into business

lender.name: Jabari
lender.loan_because: a friend gave me a gift certificate, then I matched it. As long as I have, I have enough to give. And I am not alone.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a bakery/pizzeria in Oakland, CA, that is a cooperative business, so all the workers and also member-owners. We have no boss, we work together and share the rewards and responsibilities.

lender.name: Rusty
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe in helping others in need. With over 2 billion people/families living off of just $2 a day we can make a difference in their lives really quick. I plan to turn my business into a Kiva supporting operation.
lender.occupational_info: I believe in helping others, not with just meeting their immediate needs but with a lasting effect so that they can eventually return the favor to someone else. Kiva has given me this ability. We are not just giving someone a fish to feed them for a day but are giving them the equipment they need to continually fish each day per say.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: to help people with their needs.
lender.occupational_info: I run our church's religions education program for children ages 5-18 years old.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: we are all connected
lender.occupational_info: I am starting an international school for 18-25 year olds from all walks of life. I am also a travel photographer.

lender.name: Roberto Milk
lender.loan_because: I work with artisans worldwide and I know what a big difference access to credit makes.
lender.occupational_info: We work with artisans through our local offices in Asia, Africa and Latin America and we give them access to the world market so they can sell their handmade treasures to collectors worldwide.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people achieve the best health they can.

lender.name: Sidsel & Paul
lender.loan_because: Having just started a new business ourselves, we empathize with these entrepreneurs. We believe that paying it forward is an integral part of being successful, both personally and professionally.
lender.occupational_info: It requires courage and strength to manifest dreams. Thank you Kiva for providing a way for us to make a difference!

lender.name: Linda Theung
lender.loan_because: I should share whatever I can with the world's needy. I don't necessarily need the money I loaned, so it's better that someone else use it for the time being.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure the things that people write are grammatically and factually accurate.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people start businesses and help them to provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I sell products on the internet to people that live in America.

lender.name: kush
lender.loan_because: I wish to leave this world a little better than it was.
lender.occupational_info: Was a software programmer, currently studying for my Masters degree

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: God's been good to me and I want to show His love by helping those less fortunate make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: Scientific Researcher

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupational_info: I study earthquakes and earthquake hazard

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I don't want to wait until I'm old to embrace humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student at NYU's Carter School of Journalism.

lender.name: Matthias
lender.loan_because: Give entrepreneurs a chance to fulfill their dreams
lender.occupational_info: Finding solutions for a sustainable future

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I should, and I can.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I hope I can make a small difference in the world by supporting people in different countries who are trying to make an honest living for themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: I draft and negotiate contracts for complex real estate transactions

lender.name: Quinton
lender.loan_because: The right to credit is a modern indelible human right.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student studying chemistry and biology. Previously I have worked as a tour guide in the state of Alaska and now do research on alternatives to petroleum as a source of chemicals for industrial processes. In particular I am studying how bacteria can be used to produce chemicals needed for bioplastics.

lender.name: Julie C
lender.occupational_info: i

lender.name: Missy & David
lender.loan_because: Why not? I'm glad to help others in need, and be able to use the money paid back, to help others after that.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the tourism industry, encouraging people to travel to Canada to experience all of Canada's wonderful and unique tourism product, and stay at Delta Hotels and Resorts while visiting!

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do and it is a great way to teach my children how to give back.

lender.name: WandaC
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that a seemingly small investment can make such a big difference in the quality of someone's life.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist that is globally aware of the struggle people face because of the lack of money. I make things by hand to provide for myself, and I think it's important to give back as much as I can to help others in their quest of staying productive and giving back too.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance and I believe in Kiva's business men and women.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney for people who are charged with crimes and can't afford to hire a lawyer. Right now I represent kids ages 12 - 17.

lender.name: Investors Group A Team
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe in helping those who take the initiative to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We work helping people manage and save money for their futures.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: Being able to support yourself and your family is very important to the happiness of the world.
lender.occupational_info: Send people on holidays to visit many parts of the world.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: why not?
lender.occupational_info: Traveler

lender.name: Krzysztof
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Jayant Murty
lender.loan_because: it's a responsibility that i cannot ignore!

lender.name: Ursula
lender.loan_because: Travelling has shown me how very lucky we are...I love to make a difference and I love to share.
lender.occupational_info: I try to bring classical music into people's hearts, teaching some of my students for periods of more than 10 years.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.occupational_info: I look after the health of animals

lender.name: Nils
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs help at some point of his life
lender.occupational_info: I am selling Tools, Mobile equipment and Computer Hardware

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Give and you will receive- as simple as that.

lender.name: BLNCTY
lender.loan_because: it makes sense? it feels good? I started and cannot stop? none of the above or all?

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because:
"Do all the good you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, in all the places you can, at all the times you can, to all the people you can, as long as ever you can." -John Wesley
That quote pretty much sums it up, plus it's a JOY to give.

lender.name: Marco Fraternali
lender.loan_because: everibody must have almost an opportunity in their lives

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because:
I would like my money to help those who need it to make an effort to improve their lives and contribution in the world.
I have lived a blessed life so far and it would not be complete without the ability to share some of my fortune.
I would also like to share a smile with you today. I hope you have a good one :-)
lender.occupational_info:
I own a small salon in Hong Kong which provides hand and feet spa services as well as threading, waxing and massage. We tidy people up and give them a place to relax and take a break from their busy city lives. www.feelgoodfactor.com.hk
I also work for a small, independent, creative branding and marketing agency where I concentrate on the overall development of the company and its people. In doing this, I handle new business enquiries, our marketing, the account servicing team and look for ways to grow the business and the fulfillment of the folks working in it. www.stepworks.com.hk

lender.name: Gronstal Cousins
lender.loan_because: Our fathers were bankers & we had money left from our family reunion. This is the best way to spend it!

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: I can. I feel very lucky I am able to help others!

lender.name: Viktor
lender.loan_because: I want and I can share energy!!!

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: If it feels right do it.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I wish that all my grow, prosper and live up to their potential.

lender.name: Lorenzo
lender.loan_because: Loan is beautiful!!!

lender.name: Branden
lender.loan_because: I think its great for geography instruction within the classroom and I wanted to try it out before we do this as a class.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Middle School social studies to some amazing students.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I have a dream ...
lender.occupational_info: ... just a small fish in the big ocean ...

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I love completing successful projects: on time, on budget, and producing planned or better results. I also love mentoring.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to help and to share. Inspired by the movie "The Bucket List" and by my friend Kim for input on how to achieve item number two. Check out my blog to find out more.
lender.occupational_info: I generate ideas and I coach people to help them achieve their goals.

lender.name: Stasia
lender.loan_because: I have been, and continue to be, blessed. I feel a responsibility to pass that energy on. I like helping others to be able to make a difference in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I care for animals on a small hobby farm. We have donkeys, sheep, goats, chickens, a few geese and ducks, and household dogs and cats.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: The sad state of the distribution of wealth in this world. Just a few percent of this planets inhabitants owns most of the wealth, while many others live in poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a senior software developer and systems architect working on nation-wide IT systems in the health sector.

lender.name: anna
lender.loan_because: I try to leave this world a little better than I found it...

lender.name: Kade
lender.loan_because: Kiva connects me with people across the the world as well as helping me learn about foreign lifestyles, economic conditions, and creative business ideas. It also allows me to help people in need with money that would otherwise be stagnant.
lender.occupational_info: When not in school I am busy mowing lawns and working at my local park, coaching youth sports. This allows me to save money and share it too.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I'm so lucky to have what I do, and I want to share with others.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It is better to give fishing lessons than fish
lender.occupational_info: I expand market shares for my product in North and Latin Americas

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I love the Kiva concept! People who want to make a difference can join together to empower entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Becky

lender.name: Ulrika
lender.loan_because: I want to show that Jesus cares and loves people. I hope what little I give can be a blessing to somebody.

lender.name: Arnolfo e Eliane
lender.loan_because: helping someone in need is keeping himself in good health. Try

lender.name: R. K.
lender.loan_because: If my small donation can impact a family as told in the stories, it's the least I can do. I chose Peru because I'm visiting Peru next year.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the non profit area. I raise money to help people.

lender.name: Cherie & Troy
lender.loan_because: We think its a wonderful gift to be able to be self sufficient in being able to provide an income for yourself and feel blessed here in Australia.
lender.occupational_info: We buy vintage and preloved clothing and sell it on the internet.

lender.name: Marinelle
lender.loan_because: I love to make people happy!

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I have a small business and I want to give encouragement to others who are making their own way in the world.
lender.occupational_info: As a life coach, I help people change their habits in order to create the life they truly want rather than the one they inherited.

lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a technical product manager and I mainly work with sales of industrial computer systems and related components.

lender.name: The Sullenszinos

lender.occupational_info: I help inner city kids talk about their problems and my husband keeps people's computers running.

lender.name: violeta
lender.loan_because: I can and I hope my little bit helps.

lender.loan_because: I want to share the gifts I have received from others.

I hope to help my students lead better lives as they learn to be thoughtful and compassionate in their communications.

lender.name: Goocat
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate
lender.occupational_info: Hunting mice, playing with them, killing and eating them.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it's an easy way to make a big impact in someones life.

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: I am in awe of these amazing small business people, who do so much with so little. I can learn a lot from them.

lender.name: Sumant
lender.loan_because: I work with indigenous communities in south India and am interested in participatory models of development which aim to empower marginalised communities
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying the impact of development on local healing practices and rituals for the Paniyas of Wayanad, an ex-slave tribal community in South India.

lender.name: MacFamily
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can help others.

lender.name: Jen
lender.occupational_info: I hire and train people to be lifeguards and swimming instructors at a local swimming pool.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I wouldn't be where I am without some help
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher of World History to High School students

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I can, therefore I should.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I have my own business and know how hard it was to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I help nonprofit organizations keep their books and records so that they can concentrate on their mission.

lender.name: Nieske
lender.loan_because: it is a nice and constructive way to enable people in less fortunate circumstances to hopefully start their own upward spiral.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I feel I can be of a little assistance and am grateful to have this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Through my work I am able to direct the universal healing energies through my hands into all parts of your body. To assist healing and balance on an emotional, spiritual and physical level.

lender.name: Nikhilesh
lender.loan_because: Helping proud, capable and hard-working people achieve their goals is rewarding. This gives people who wouldn't qualify for bank loans but have good ideas and the capacity to pay back loans a chance to access finance.
lender.occupational_info: I write about economic developments in the Asia Pacific region.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I believe that what we see as a small amount of money can have a huge impact if it makes it into the right hands.

lender.name: CMM
lender.loan_because: Sharing is grace in action.
lender.occupational_info: I design, develop and deliver a wide range of training and marketing materials.

lender.name: Silke
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people

lender.name: Pierfederico
lender.loan_because: This is a way to help people with initiatives to improve their status.

lender.name: Rix Kane Family
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Anna Maria
lender.loan_because: Lived in Nigeria for 10 years and it's time to give back

lender.name: Pia Christine
lender.loan_because: I hope to give something back of the godd things I recieved in my Live.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Goverment of Aachen.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I believe that if you give people a chance, for the most part they will find success.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell Canadian native art.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I have a wonderful life and am fortunate enough to be able to travel. This is a great organisation, and , after reading the book Pay it Forward this is an ideal fit for my idea of how charity should work.

lender.name: Tahnee
lender.loan_because: I am so excited to be able to empower someone on the other side of the world to take control of their life and create their own wealth and happiness. I feel honoured to be part of this wonderful website.
lender.occupational_info:
In my Feldenkrais classes I help people learn how to move without pain, stiffness or effort. My students rediscover the joy of moving like a child!
I also run groups to inspire people to live in a more enviromentally sustainable, socially just and spiritually fulfilling way.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: Together with my friends in the CD group, we want to make a difference in people's lives by giving them the chance to help themselves.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping hard working people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: My role was to help senior leaders in my companies set and achieve their goals... all adding up to success for the company.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I have a good life and I can affort a lot of things, like going on vacation, having a nice home, earning enought money. I have been in Cambodia at the beginning of this year and I saw a lot of poor people. With my loan I want to help some of the Cambodian people to improve their life and enjoy more from life. I want to give them some quality time in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a customer service representative at an American Company in the Netherlands.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I am interesting in helping support other entrepreneurs, and understand the value the need for capital to do this. I also believe that small business owners can make a difference, and hope I can help a little towards building some successful projects.
lender.occupational_info: I have built internet based community websites that generate revenue from advertising, and subscription revenues. I sell these websites to media companies, consumer brands, and digital agencies.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: It's a far better approach to help people than "foreign aid" or the World Bank.

lender.name: Ronnie
lender.occupational_info: I work in research and development for a major worldwide pharmaceutical company.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, help themselves to have a future.
lender.occupational_info: I take photographs for organisations who want to communicate what they do visually

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity.

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: I believe that owning a business allows one to be self-sufficient.

lender.name: RICHARD
lender.loan_because: I feel great when I see these people reach a goal in the task or the project they have set for themselves. When they get to their goal, I feel like cheering. The loan repayment just shows the success that these people are having and how gratifying it is to see the responsibility that these borrowers have shown. Some have been quite amazing in how quickly they have repaid their loans. I wish I could send them a letter of congratulations !

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to have a direct impact on people's lives.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: If helping one or two people can ultimately help a community, then it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I rent small furnished offices to small companies. We provide access to conference rooms, office equipment and telephone/internet services

lender.name: Quang Duc TA
lender.loan_because: I really hope a better world for human race...
lender.occupational_info: Give and you will receive in return...

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I like to know my donations are going directly to help someone who is working to help themselves or those around them achieve success. I was interested in MFI from the minute I heard of it years ago and have always lightly wondered how to become a part of it. A news article in the Toronto Star recently directed me to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher in Canada, teaching history and law, with educational focus on the effects of imperialism around the world.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I want to put my money where my mouth is. I tell my own kids and my students it's our responsibility to help out others less "lucky" in this world because I feel very lucky to have been born healthy, happy and Canadian.
lender.occupational_info: I teach French as a second language to students in grades 4 though 8, age 9 to 14. The last two loans made were with money raised by my wonderful grade 8s!

lender.name: Ling Family
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference in so many lives. pay it forward x 1000, And when paid back, lend it again!

lender.name: Sandy + Anne
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can! Micro financing is a small step that we can take to help an entrepreneur. Entrepreneurs will forge the world's future.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: I feel so fortunate to live in Canada and helping someone less fortunate just makes one feel good. Kiva is a wonderful way of making a difference to enterprising people who just need a helping hand to get started.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from Corp. Communications

lender.name: Brian Bialeschki
lender.loan_because: I have the money.
lender.occupational_info: I dont like raisins.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: it feels so good

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I am living a blessed life and wish to share my good fortune with others who are trying to improve their own and their families' lives with their entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant with financial responsibility for a team of accountants working in a large U.S. company that produces poultry products sold in the United States and internationally.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: For a low cost to me, I can hopefully help make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Jacqui
lender.loan_because: I see the greater good in helping other human beings pursue a better life.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. --- Eleanor Roosevelt
lender.occupational_info: As an educator, I teach my students to be socially responsible and how to make a positive change in the world.

lender.name: EKong
lender.loan_because: "Our sympathy is cold to the relation of distant misery"

lender.name: Abbey
lender.loan_because: My work allows for extensive travel, and I appreciate how great an impact our support makes for people in our global community.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses and their IT departments effectively work together to achieve their goals.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: Ich finde die die Idee großartig, mit vielen Menschen gemeinsam durch kleine Schritte, etwas zu bewegen. I like the idea, to make a little difference together with other people all over the world.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help get someone's business started

lender.name: Ribeiro family
lender.loan_because: i like to see people be self sufficient, and build their own future.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: I can! As an entrepreneur it certainly makes me feel good that I am assisting someone else get a start or a leg up in a small business that will help them and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I produce film and television for the international market place.

lender.name: Stephanie and Bob
lender.loan_because: What a great way to help people!

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: dignity counts. And not all Americans suck.
lender.occupational_info: I help people decide if they have drug and alcohol problems, and I help them get treatment if they need it.

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help.
lender.occupational_info: Engineer and factory production manager and owner

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: Just a little money can go a long way in developing countries.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful and easy way to help people throughtout the world achieve their goals for themselves and their families

lender.name: Ruth-Ann
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Bjørn Petter
lender.loan_because: I believe that loans are better than blind donations to corrupt governments. Loans make people work harder, and it gives them an objective...
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and computer networks.

lender.name: Shalin
lender.loan_because: I believe that the access to funds to create your own opportunities is the best way to ensure a person's welfare and in extension the prosperity of their region.

lender.name: Prem Devo Bhava
lender.loan_because: I beleive in Micro Finance
lender.occupational_info: Corporate Finance

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I support this idea.
lender.occupational_info: I help design, inspect & commission building construction projects. I work for the Canadian Government.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: Although my life has not been perfect by any means, I have always found the money to follow my dreams. I want to make it possible for others to do the same.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: This is an excellent concept for addressing poverty in a way that promote self-sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: I manage 10 Business Analysts at a software company. Business Analysts research and document new features for software development.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it doesn't take a lot of credit to create a powerful force for fighting poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I solve worthwhile, difficult business and technology problems, usually after someone else has said, "Can't."

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: lending/giving money to those less fortunate than I is one of the few ways I can help others at this point in my life. I get a good feeling inside knowing that my loan, when combined with the loans of others just like myself, really can make a difference in another person's life across the world. The magic of the internet! :-)
lender.occupational_info: I am a student currently "finding" myself right now... Whatever that means.

lender.name: JoAnne
lender.loan_because: I can. Because I am fortunate to live and work in a country of plenty and peace, and because, for the cost of one ordinary fast-food-dinner-to-go, I can make a positive contribution to another family's quality of living.

lender.name: Fatima & Dilip
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN LIVES OF OTHERS
lender.occupational_info: THAT OTHERS CARE

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I really want to connect - to be of service to others - we are all one world
lender.occupational_info: I work in feature film doing make-up; however, I am evolving as a life coach, among other things

lender.name: Ginette
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Mary and Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help people earn a living wage.

lender.name: a Free Mind supporter
lender.loan_because:
NON SIA SOLO UNA FAVOLA! «Durante un incendio nella foresta, mentre tutti gli animali fuggivano, un colibrì volava in senso contrario con una goccia d'acqua nel becco. "Cosa credi di fare!" Gli chiese il leone. "Vado a spegnere l'incendio!" Rispose il piccolo volatile. "Con una goccia d'acqua?" Disse il leone con un sogghigno di irrisione. Ed il colibrì, proseguendo il volo, rispose: "Io faccio la mia parte!".»
--
Avrei piacere di averti nel nostro team di finanziatori "Free Mind (Italia)"
Unendoti al nostro team di finanziatori, possiamo lavorare insieme per alleviare la povertà.
Facendo parte della squadra, hai l'opzione di contribuire con i tuoi prestiti su Kiva a formare l'impatto totale del nostro team. I prestiti rimangono tuoi - ed i rimborsi verranno accreditati direttamente a te - ma puoi anche scegliere che anche i tuoi prestiti vengano visualizzati in un portafoglio collettivo della nostra squadra "Free Mind (Italia)"!
Scopri la squadra http://www.kiva.org/team/FrMind?default_team=FrMind
Il sito é in inglese... puoi usare http://goo.gl/4vx2j per una traduzione google automatica in italiano.
lender.occupational_info: Sono vegan perché credo che le mie azioni hanno un senso. Sono vegan perché credo che un animale ha il diritto di vivere senza essere di proprietà di un altro. Sono vegan perché la pace, la giustizia e l'eguaglianza non possono esistere in un mondo che fa STRAGE di miliardi di esseri per la BANALE ragione che hanno un buon sapore. [Mac McDaniel] ✫(◠‿◠)✫ ....__/\\__.... и∂m∂§Tع' I'm vegan because I believe that my actions have meaning. I'm vegan because I believe an animal has the right to live without being the property of another. I'm vegan because peace, justice, and equality cannot exist in a world that slaughters billions for the trivial reason that they taste good. [Mac McDaniel]

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the chance at a better life.

lender.name: paintrjess
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the best life we can give each other.
lender.occupational_info: I find finance options for auto loans

lender.name: Action eBiz
lender.loan_because: Improving someone's life $25 at a time.

lender.name: febra johnson
lender.loan_because: I know it's alway better too work for youself , everybody need help at times,
lender.occupational_info: I own a gift store in mobile al, usa. we sell too peaceful loving people

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: this is what I can afford, and because it is a fantastic idea. I truly believe there is enough for all of us. We all must share.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Ministry of Health in my province. My son is the one who chooses who to help, by reading the stories of the applicants.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: When wealth is equally distributed, everyone wins.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to help others and therefore should do so. Love the idea of being able to re-invest repaid loans!
lender.occupational_info: Working within the mining industry and with a predominately developing nation focus, I ensure that multi-national companies operate in an ethical, socially responsible and transparent manner.

lender.name: Bananabrianna and Monkey
lender.loan_because: We want a better world for our daughter to grow up in
lender.occupational_info: Assist my company and the CCAC with providing the best care possible to clients in their homes

lender.name: denise
lender.loan_because: I have more financial opportunities in my life and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: It is alot of fun! My students are ages 6 to 8 years of age. I teach then art, music and drama.

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupation: student data manager at KIPP DC
lender.loan_because: I've seen through working at a school that helps those typically overlooked what a difference empowerment can make in someone's life

lender.name: Stealth
lender.loan_because: I know that people need money to make money, and will work hard if given the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a classroom high school math teacher. I love being in a classroom with young adults learning how to be successful people!

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to get ahead.

lender.name: Ofisa Nyaikondo
lender.loan_because: The best way to better the world is to give tools to others. By doing so, we make a difference, one family at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Lifetime responsible learner, professional, organizer, activist, advocate, planner, listener, volunteer, and global servant. The global war on poverty and advancement of opportunities begins by spurring hope. By advancing the spirit of giving, I can contribute and participate in mobilizing the human capital that will see us building a strong, vibrant community. I plan to make it a lifelong pursuit.

lender.name: Anjum
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves. I joined after Kiva was introduced to me in Church.

lender.name: Janice & Ken
lender.loan_because: my husband and I received seed funding for his company and it has meant a great deal to us.
lender.occupational_info: We are fundraisers focused on people leaving a bequest in one's will to a charity they love and support (you can't take it with you!). I officiate weddings, funerals and other types of ritual ceremonies, along with being a bereavement counselor.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I might not be able to help everyone in the world, but helping one person at a time is how change begins.

lender.name: Fabrizio
lender.loan_because: I like to help

lender.name: Bruce & Wendy
lender.loan_because: I think its a fantastic way to help people, it is the small businesses that do the most for everyone.

lender.name: Paul & Kristi
lender.loan_because:
If a brother or sister is poorly clothed and lacking in daily food, and one of you says to them, "Go in peace, be warmed and filled," without giving them the things needed for the body, what good is that? James 2:15-16
Better is a poor man who walks in his integrity than a rich man who is crooked in his ways. Proverbs 28:6

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: As a fellow entrepreneur, I am very interested in helping people who want to create or improve their own circumstances. It's rewarding to be able to lend a hand to people in all regions of the world, and I'm especially touched that I can help people in Eastern Europe where all of my grandparents were born.
lender.occupational_info: I do writing and graphic design for marketing and communication pieces, mainly for bank clients.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make sure people and companies treat our precious natural resources with respect.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to give back and help other people out if you can. I think Kiva is a phenomenal concept and they are doing a great job, while allowing people to improve their standard of living!

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to live in Canada and enjoy a good life. This is a chance to help others enjoy a good life.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: I am aware of my blessings and want to contribute something to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are depressed, anxious or who are having problems in relationships.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who deserves it
lender.occupational_info: My job is to make sure people are safe at work

lender.name: Ine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to make it easier to start their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I study traveling and turism, in Norway, and would like to start my own business some day. I just don't know what kind of business yet. =)

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I am a business student and I love the idea of microfinance. I want to share the success that I have enjoyed, however much or however little with those that need it around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am going into my last year of an International Business Administration degree at York University in Toronto. I have had the luck of working in financial services, consumer packaged goods and energy management and I look forward to the rest of my education and my future career!

lender.name: Eric and Sue
lender.loan_because: We wish to make a contribution to global society but want to have some measure of control of where our contribution goes.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an IT Support Team.

lender.name: Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: I'm fascinated with the ability to change the world one person at a time.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I like the concept of micro loans - getting money to 'the average person'.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get things done faster and cheaper.

lender.name: Linn
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate. I had not heard of Kiva and found this effort very worth while.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have been traumatized.

lender.name: Peter & Felice
lender.loan_because: Our hearts tell us to.

lender.name: Lucius
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to have a better life one step at a time and I feel that people deserve a better life, education and living standards.
lender.occupational_info: I have a lemonade stand every summer at a crafts fair, using real lemons. I use my profits to help people starting their businesses.

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who need money and have good ideas.
lender.occupational_info: I am going into second grade.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I think it's both interesting and important.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a major U.S. non-profit. The non-profit is a leading provider of research grants and public health information.

lender.name: ADC
lender.loan_because: Poverty is at the root of so many problems. When poverty is addressed and eradicated, our world will become a joyful place for everyone.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I think this kind of loan can make a real difference.
lender.occupational_info: Help people to find a job they love.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible for a little to go a long way.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: Less fortunate, hard workers need a chance.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: Too often we are too consumed with our own need to be smarter, prettier, thinner, wealthier, when others around the world are can't find the means to meet the basic needs of humanity. It's so easy to make a difference to someone else who needs a little support.

lender.name: John H
lender.loan_because: I believe in the individual, their right to progress, self-determination and hope.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: .. a little bit at the right place, at the right time makes a difference.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help people get ahead. I have so much, and I give to help others.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that I can make a difference.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: It is my pleasure to help someone less fortunate than myself, help themselves.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: Just a little bit can change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the arts.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro solutions are the way to macro change. Show generosity to one and they will pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare the design drawings and facilitate the municipal approval process to get residential, commercial, industrial and institutional structures built.
